original_title: Import restrictions on over 300 products to be relaxed tonight
original_body_lines: The import restrictions imposed on 328 more items will be relaxed tonight, State Minister for Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said.
Last year, due to the foreign exchange crisis, the Government imposed restrictions on the import of 1,465 items.
However, subsequently, certain restrictions were gradually relaxed on selected products, considering the evolving economic situation. (DSB)
